alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 8:21PM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oakdale ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Water over lowest portions of Goos Ferry Road. Cars should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:35 PM CDT Monday the stage was 2.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:35 PM CDT Monday was 2.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 3.0 feet Tuesday, March 29. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.8 Mon 7 pm CDT 2.4 2.6 2.7 &&
